mapper.sql: stock_detail_id, order_no, relate_id, sku, category_name, category_code, operation_type, goods_unit, quantity, single_price, creator_id, creator_name, create_date
mapper.select:
SELECT order_no, sku, category_name, operation_type, goods_unit, sum( quantity ) quantity, single_price,
date_format(create_date, '%Y') create_date
date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m') create_date
FROM ec_stock_detail WHERE create_date >= str_to_date( #{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND create_date <= str_to_date( #{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) GROUP BY order_no, sku, category_name, operation_type, goods_unit, single_price,
date_format(create_date, '%Y')
date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m')
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ec_stock_detail(stock_detail_id, order_no, relate_id, sku, category_name, category_code, operation_type, goods_unit, quantity, single_price, creator_id, creator_name, create_date) VALUES
(#{item.stockDetailId}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.relateId}, #{item.sku}, #{item.categoryName}, #{item.categoryCode}, #{item.operationType}, #{item.goodsUnit}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.singlePrice}, #{item.creatorId}, #{item.creatorName}, #{item.createDate})
